com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupLabel

  • public class ScupLabel
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a label widget.
    This is a kind of base widget.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScupLabel.TapListener
      This listener interface is called when user taps on the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupLabel instance.
        If the Label is shown on the screen, label should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(int align)
        Sets the text alignment.
        Parameters:
        align - alignment
        Must be one or more (separated by '|') of the following constant values.
        Item alignment - ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_TOP, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_BOTTOM, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_LEFT, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_RIGHT, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_VERTICAL_CENTER, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_CENTER, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_CENTER.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If align is invalid.

      • setIconPosition

        public void setIconPosition(int position)
        Sets the icon position.
        The default is POSITION_ICON_LEFT.
        Parameters:
        position - Must be one of below types POSITION_ICON_LEFT, POSITION_ICON_RIGHT, POSITION_ICON_ABOVE, POSITION_ICON_BELOW.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If align is invalid.

      • getIconPosition

        public int getIconPosition()
        Gets the icon position.
        Returns:
        One of below types POSITION_ICON_LEFT, POSITION_ICON_RIGHT, POSITION_ICON_ABOVE, POSITION_ICON_BELOW.
        See Also:
        setIconPosition(int)

      • getAlignment

        public int getAlignment()
        Gets the alignment
        Returns:
        One of below alignments: ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_TOP, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_BOTTOM, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_LEFT, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_RIGHT, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_VERTICAL_CENTER, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_CENTER, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_CENTER.
        See Also:
        setAlignment(int)

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the padding in the label widget.
        Parameters:
        left - the left padding in point units
        top - the top padding in point units
        right - the right padding in point units
        bottom - the bottom padding in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.

      • setBorderType

        public void setBorderType(int type)
        Sets the border style of the title.
        It is one of BORDER_TYPE_NONE, BORDER_TYPE_INTAGLIO, BORDER_TYPE_SHADOW, BORDER_TYPE_SQUARE, or BORDER_TYPE_UNDERLINE
        Parameters:
        type - border type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If style is invalid type.

      • getBorderType

        public int getBorderType()
        Gets the border type of label widget
        Returns:
        One of BORDER_TYPE_NONE, BORDER_TYPE_INTAGLIO, BORDER_TYPE_SHADOW, BORDER_TYPE_SQUARE, or BORDER_TYPE_UNDERLINE
        See Also:
        setBorderType(int)
